text: Hello, how are you? I started my placement preparation only 10 days before the placement season started. But why? I remember I had around 70,000 subscribers and I was working very seriously on my channel. And I had a dream that I would start my own content agency and skip the placement. Yes, I had a plan that I would not sit in the placement. But obviously, what we think is not always what happens. If you come from a middle class family, then you know how much responsibility and pressure you have. And you all also know how much is the need of a stable income source so that you can support your family. I was working on my content agency but I was not getting much success. And my placement season had also started in my college. As the placement season was coming closer, I was getting a lot of comments on my YouTube channel. That brother, did you get your placement or not? What is the scene of the placement? Many people were showing a lot of hate that your placement is not going to happen. You will just keep making videos. So, man, because of all these things, to tell the truth, a lot of pressure had come. A lot of hate was coming, the expectations of family and relatives were also increasing. And the college friends also used to tease that we do not think that your placement is going to happen. Slowly, these things got so much into my mind that I was feeling directionless. I was not understanding what to do now. And to tell the truth, at that time I was very scared. I had anxiety about my future. And it was so much that I had to ban the word placement from YouTube. Because whenever I used to go to the comment section, I used to see comments like this. And as soon as I saw, the placement season came very close. Only 10 days were left and now I had no other choice. I had to crack the placement. Somehow. Hello. Hello son, how was the interview? Yes mom. Done. I have done the placement, but what I learned from this journey and where I made mistakes, let's talk about it now. My first mistake was that I started my placement preparation very late. Now June is going on and your summer break must be going on. And this is the best time to start your placement and internship preparation. You get the right time and when your colleges will start after August and after a month, companies will start coming. Then you will be very confident about your skills. Second problem is that what to study. Our biggest problem is that we are not able to stay focused. There is an abundance of resources on the internet and because of this abundance, we get very confused. What to study and what not to study. And if we are starting our preparation at this time, then we have no time to figure out what to study and what not to study. Which resources to follow. We need a structure and right guidance during our preparation. And I think this is the best time to invest in yourself and invest in a structured course. We don't have much time, 3-4 months, so investing in a structured course will be the best decision. I didn't have many options at my time. I remember I purchased a course, it was very expensive. But today we have so many affordable options available. Like you see Aman Bhaiya's Alpha course, I guess he has already taught 3-4 batches at very affordable rates. And now his 5th batch has been launched. I was watching his video a couple of days ago. A few days ago when I met Aman Bhaiya, he also showed me the Alpha course structure. In which Shraddha Ma'am is teaching. So he showed me how he is teaching DSA from scratch. So such courses are very curated. In that you are taught DSA from scratch. Interview problems are done. Like in Alpha you are given 300 plus interview problems. If you have a problem in OSD, BMS. Whatever you need to be placement ready. All that is done. And your tension that where should I find resources, what should I study, what should I not study. All that ends. You start seeing a clear path. And you are also helped in resume building and interview preparation. If I get the link, I will put it in the description. You can check it out. So I think by investing in such a course, you will be ready for placement in 3-4 months. The time of placement and internship preparation is very hectic and stressful. And it is very important to have a good routine at this time. I feel that I followed a very good routine at my time. Because of which I got my placement. I used to wake up early in the morning, used to go to the gym, I used to eat healthy. I used to try a lot that I sleep on time. Because my day started early, so I had a lot of time and energy to study. And I used to get so tired by going to the gym that I used to sleep early at night. And my routine was very good. Here I want to give you advice that you take the 100 days personal development challenge with me. You challenge yourself that I have to do 10 DSA problems in a day. I have to go to the gym, I have to attend my classes on time. I have to eat good healthy food. I have to spend some time with my family. After doing this, you check your confidence yourself. Fourth comes to make a gap from social media. Like I had banned the placement word from my comment section. Similarly, you have to ban negative people from your life. You don't need people who always demotivate you. I also had some friends in college who used to make fun of me. They used to say that he can only do YouTube, his interview will not be cracked. So you have to be careful with such people. And you have to change the content you consume on social media platforms. Because social media platforms show you what you want to see. So if you see such content that helps you reach your goal. Then social media will also show you the same content again and again. So you have to change the recommendations in your social media feed. The last and most important point is your mental health. Mental pressure is the most common during the placement preparation. Your parents' expectations, your own expectations, your relatives' expectations. What your friends are saying about you. All these things will affect you from here. And the person who is drained from here, then things are over. Everyone has resources, everyone can access, everyone has 24 hours. Everyone can study, everyone can achieve their goals. But the one who will lose from here is the first time in the race. And the one who wins from here, wins. So let's keep it light. I am not saying that you have to study 24 hours. Take time for your family, go out with your friends. Talk to your friends on the phone, chill a little, watch a series. It's not like you are studying all day. Because if you go from here, then the game is over. So that was it for today's video. Share this video with all your good friends apart from your snake friends. On WhatsApp, Instagram, everywhere. And I will meet you in such a special video. Till then, bye bye.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: And the one who wins from here, wins.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: So let's keep it light. I am not saying that you have to study 24 hours.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: Take time for your family, go out with your friends.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: Talk to your friends on the phone, chill a little, watch a series.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: It's not like you are studying all day.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: Because if you go from here, then the game is over.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: So that was it for today's video.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: Share this video with all your good friends apart from your snake friends.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: On WhatsApp, Instagram, everywhere.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: And I will meet you in such a special video.

chunks.title: -online_How I got a 16 LPA package in JUST 3 Months!  My @Accenture  Placement Story  Placements 2023_480p
chunks.text: Till then, bye bye.
